descriptor.name: Cotton Flared Kurta
descriptor.long_desc:
Embrace timeless elegance with this cotton flared kurta, designed for women who appreciate both comfort and style. Crafted from high-quality, breathable cotton, this kurta is an ideal choice for warm weather or long days. The flattering flared cut drapes beautifully around the body, creating a graceful silhouette that complements all body types.

This kurta comes in vibrant colors and intricate prints, perfect for elevating your everyday look or adding a touch of sophistication to special occasions. Whether you’re heading to a casual outing, work, or a festive gathering, this versatile kurta can be effortlessly paired with leggings, palazzos, or jeans to suit the occasion.

The round neckline and three-quarter sleeves add to its simple yet stylish appeal, while the soft cotton fabric ensures you stay cool and comfortable all day long. Enhance your wardrobe with this beautiful cotton flared kurta, a perfect blend of comfort, tradition, and contemporary style.
descriptor.short_desc: This stylish cotton flared kurta features a flowy and elegant design, perfect for both casual and festive occasions. The soft, breathable cotton fabric ensures all-day comfort, while the flared silhouette adds a touch of grace and femininity to your wardrobe.

@ondc/org/statutory_reqs_packaged_commod.manufacturer_or_packer_address: plot no. 60, Vishwamitra Nagar, Vishwakarma Industrial Area, Murlipura, Jaipur, Rajasthan 302039

descriptor.name: Rayon Straight Kurta
descriptor.long_desc:
Step into effortless style with this rayon straight kurta, offering a blend of comfort and elegance. Made from premium-quality rayon fabric, this kurta is soft to the touch and drapes beautifully, making it ideal for everyday wear or special occasions. The straight-cut design creates a structured, streamlined silhouette that flatters all body shapes, giving you a chic and polished appearance.

With its simple yet refined style, this kurta is versatile enough to be paired with churidars, trousers, or palazzos for different occasions. The minimalistic design is accentuated by thoughtful details like a round or V-neckline, three-quarter or full-length sleeves, and side slits for ease of movement.

Whether you're heading to the office, a casual get-together, or a festive event, this rayon straight kurta brings a touch of sophistication to your wardrobe. The fabric’s lightweight and breathable qualities make it an excellent choice for all-day wear, keeping you comfortable and stylish at the same time.
descriptor.short_desc: This elegant rayon straight kurta is designed for a sleek, modern look. Its smooth texture and straight silhouette make it perfect for both casual and formal occasions. The lightweight rayon fabric ensures comfort while providing a sophisticated touch to your outfit.

@ondc/org/statutory_reqs_packaged_commod.manufacturer_or_packer_address: plot no. 60, Vishwamitra Nagar, Vishwakarma Industrial Area, Murlipura, Jaipur, Rajasthan 302039

descriptor.name: Georgette Straight Kurta
descriptor.long_desc:
Elevate your fashion game with this gorgeous georgette straight kurta, designed for women who seek both style and comfort. Crafted from delicate and lightweight georgette fabric, this kurta is perfect for making a statement at any event. The fabric's soft drape creates a sleek and sophisticated silhouette, while the straight cut gives it a modern edge, suitable for formal gatherings, office wear, or casual outings.

The sheer elegance of the georgette fabric adds a touch of grace to your appearance, and its flowy texture ensures comfort throughout the day. This kurta is available in a variety of bold and subtle colors, with intricate patterns or embellishments, making it a versatile addition to your wardrobe.

Designed with details like a round or V-neckline, full or three-quarter sleeves, and side slits for ease of movement, this georgette straight kurta can be paired with leggings, palazzos, or straight pants for a chic and polished look. Whether you’re attending a formal event, a family gathering, or a casual meetup, this kurta adds a refined and sophisticated flair to your ensemble, keeping you effortlessly stylish.
descriptor.short_desc: This chic georgette straight kurta offers a stylish and contemporary look, ideal for both casual and festive occasions. The lightweight and flowy georgette fabric enhances its elegance, while the straight silhouette ensures a flattering fit.

@ondc/org/statutory_reqs_packaged_commod.manufacturer_or_packer_address: plot no. 60, Vishwamitra Nagar, Vishwakarma Industrial Area, Murlipura, Jaipur, Rajasthan 302039

descriptor.name: A-line Kurta  (Blue)
descriptor.long_desc:
Add a dash of elegance to your wardrobe with this beautiful blue A-line kurta, crafted for women who value both comfort and style. The A-line silhouette offers a flattering fit that gently flares out from the waist, creating a graceful and feminine look. The kurta’s flowy design ensures ease of movement, making it an excellent choice for daily wear, festive occasions, or casual outings.

Made from premium fabric, this blue A-line kurta is lightweight, breathable, and soft against the skin, ensuring comfort even during long hours. The vibrant blue hue adds a refreshing pop of color to your outfit, making it stand out, while minimalistic detailing keeps the design timeless and elegant.

The kurta features a round neckline and three-quarter sleeves, giving it a balanced, versatile look that can be easily paired with leggings, palazzos, or jeans. Whether you’re heading to work, meeting friends, or attending a festive event, this A-line kurta is a wardrobe essential that combines traditional charm with contemporary flair.
descriptor.short_desc: This stunning blue A-line kurta combines style and comfort, making it perfect for everyday wear or special occasions. The A-line silhouette enhances your figure, while the soft fabric ensures all-day comfort. Its vibrant blue color adds a refreshing touch to your wardrobe.

@ondc/org/statutory_reqs_packaged_commod.manufacturer_or_packer_address: plot no. 60, Vishwamitra Nagar, Vishwakarma Industrial Area, Murlipura, Jaipur, Rajasthan 302039

descriptor.name: Anarkali Kurta  (Green)
descriptor.long_desc:
Step into the world of elegance with this enchanting green Anarkali kurta, designed to add a regal touch to your ethnic wardrobe. The Anarkali silhouette, known for its flowing and voluminous design, flatters all body types and gives you a graceful, princess-like look. This kurta, crafted in a rich green hue, is perfect for festive occasions, weddings, or any special event where you want to make a statement.

The fabric is soft, lightweight, and drapes beautifully, ensuring both comfort and style. The flared hem and fitted bodice create a flattering shape, while the intricate detailing adds a touch of opulence to the kurta. Whether embellished with embroidery, zari work, or minimalistic prints, the design enhances the beauty of this traditional garment.

Featuring a round or V-neckline and full or three-quarter sleeves, this Anarkali kurta can be paired with churidars or leggings for a complete ethnic look. Its versatility allows it to be styled with statement jewelry and elegant footwear, making it an ideal choice for any celebratory event. With its combination of comfort, elegance, and tradition, this green Anarkali kurta is a must-have for anyone looking to elevate their ethnic wear collection.
descriptor.short_desc: This Kurta has high-quality viscose and viscose fabric construction. The viscose construction of the kurta gives it a flexible and flowing quality. Because of its fine drapery abilities, viscose rayon gives a wonderful look. The overall appeal of the kurta is enhanced by the faint sheen of the fabric, which gives it a touch of sophistication. Such a choice of materials not only ensures a comfortable fit, but also increases the aesthetic appeal of the kurta.

@ondc/org/statutory_reqs_packaged_commod.manufacturer_or_packer_address: plot no. 60, Vishwamitra Nagar, Vishwakarma Industrial Area, Murlipura, Jaipur, Rajasthan 302039
